title: Wet Bar, Marbled Tile Bath Enclosures, Elevators
posting_body: ['Evoq Apartments encompasses the best of the Las Vegas Strip all in one convenient, modern, and central location.', 'Enjoy a storied neighborhood, engaging culture, and unique living accommodations in an unbeatable location just a block from the most luxurious Hotels and Casinos in the World.', '-Business Center with Complimentary WiFi, Computers, and Brainstorming Room', '-Covered Assigned Parking', '-Fitness Center with Cardio & Free Weights', '-Zen Yoga Studio, Massage Therapy Room, and Sauna', '-Stainless Steel Refrigerator', '-Three Resort-Style Pools, Including Spa, Cabanas, and Fire Pit', '-Controlled Access Gates', '-Glossy', 'Two Toned Grey / White Flat Panel Cabinetry', '-Well Beats Personal Fitness Classes', '-A Block from Las Vegas Strip', '-Air Conditioning', '-Marbled Tile Bath Enclosures', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
